Detailed Description

This class represents a LightBulb.

The bulb has a position and a number of variables representing the intensity of the light. Used an OpenGL positional light.

See also:
Light
Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

LightBulb::LightBulb (  ) [inline]

Default constructor for LightBulb.

Initialises variables to default - position at origin, const attenuation to 1.
